metadata.title: CVE-2020-2933 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low
metadata.description: Vulnerability in the MySQL Connectors product of Oracle MySQL (component:Connector/J). Supported versions that are affected are 5.1.48 and prior.Difficult to exploit vulnerability allows high privileged attacker withnetwork access via multiple protocols to compromise MySQL Connectors.Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorized abilityto cause a partial denial of service (partial DOS) of MySQL Connectors.CVSS 3.0 Base Score 2.2 (Availability impacts). CVSS Vector:(CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:H/PR:H/UI:N/S:U/C:N/I:N/A:L).

criterions.comment: mysql-connector-java package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
